abstract: Twenty or so other companies that may also have been attacked, are now in the difficult position of deciding whether to follow Google.
snippet: Twenty or so other companies that may also have been attacked, are now in the difficult position of deciding whether to follow Google.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Google threatened on Tuesday to pull out of China after it learned of immense security attacks and attempts to gain access to the Gmail accounts of Chinese dissidents and human rights activists.

headline.main: Google Would Abandon a Lucrative Market
headline.print_headline: Google’s Threat Would Mean Giving Up a Lucrative Market
